**Notice of Request for Information for Submarine Smoke Illumination Marker {Markur fumigène éclairant de sous-marin}**
===========================================================

### Brief Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites industry participants to submit a response to a Request for Information (RFI) related to the Submarine Smoke Illumination Marker (SSIM). The SSIM will be used on Canadian Navy Victoria Class submarines and requires three variants to provide Red, Green, and Yellow or White light and smoke signaling capability.

### Notice Details

**Tender Reference Information**

*   **Title**: Request for Information for Submarine Smoke Illumination Maker
*   **Notice Date**: 2024-07-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-09-10, 14:00:00 (EDT)
*   **RFI Number**: W8486-217398/B

### Background and Requirements

The Canadian Navy is seeking to refine its requirement for SSIM used on Canadian Navy Victoria Class submarines. The required variants of the SSIM include pyrotechnic systems capable of producing Red, Green, and Yellow or White light and smoke signals. The RFI is not a request for proposals and does not constitute a commitment by the Government of Canada to issue a request for proposal (RFP) or make an award.

### Submissions and Enquiries

Industry participants are invited to submit a response to the RFI via email to `Yvonne.dAllaire@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca` no later than 14:00:00 (EDT) on September 10, 2024. All enquiries must be submitted to PWGSC Contracting Authority, Yvonne D’Allaire by email at `Yvonne.dAllaire@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`.

### Important Notes

*   The RFI and any responses thereto do not impose any obligation or constitute any commitment on the part of Canada to issue a request for proposal (RFP) related to Submarine Smoke Illumination Marker or to make any award of business to any respondent.
*   Participating in this RFI is not a prerequisite for participating in subsequent solicitations. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
